title: 5 Minute Yoga for Back Tension (6 Movements of the Spine)
description:
Do this 5 minute yoga class to help relieve back tension and general back pain. This quick yoga class incorporated the 6 movements of the spine (Flexion, Extension, Rotation right and left, Lateral flexion right and left) to help increase mobility, flexibility and release tension from the back. Back stretches are a great addition to your morning routine to help you feel your best for the day ahead. You can also benefit from stretching your back midday or even before bed so you can sleep more comfortably at night.

#Yoga #5MinuteYoga #BackTension

 & support.

ABOUT THIS YOUTUBE YOGA CHANNEL

Francine Cipollone also known as her childhood nickname Bird is a 200hr Certified Yoga Teacher who found a passion for helping others find inner peace, self love and happiness through the practice of Yoga & Meditation. She created this YouTube Yoga Channel to offer a space where yoga is accessible to all. This channel is all about feeling good and reconnecting to self. Yoga is for every-BODY, Join the journey by Subscribing today: https://www.youtube.com/yogawithbird

comments: That made my back feel a lot better today after being in bed most of the weekend, glad to get back at it, thank you!
Enjoyed the choice of music for this one. ✨

Thank you for a quick yoga video. That is perfect for the morning. I just set an intention yesterday to start doing yoga before I do anything else every morning for the sake of my heart, health and body health. I almost skipped it this morning because I also have school work to do and I don't know how I'm going to fit it all in... But the 5-minute video helped me honor all of my priorities, and even though I only did yoga for about 5 minutes, I already feel a little bit better physically, and definitely better emotionally because I achieved a goal that I had set. Thank you for helping me do that with this video!
…I stayed because the jazz(my favorite music)and I was glad,the yoga sequence was just perfect,quick,easy ,relaxing when you got no time,but got to move things anyways 🙃
This was an amazing video! I had lower back pain all week and I feel a lot better!
